languages.text: "Конечно, мой господин. Прятки лицемеров проводятся у нас каждый лунарий. Незадолго до игрищ прислугу тщательно отмывают от грязи и нечистот, расчесывают, облачают в дорогие наряды и маски, и приглашают во двор вместе с остальными гостями. Дворяне тоже скрывают свое лицо и на протяжении всего торжества отгадывают, кто лицемер. Порой отличить их бывает крайне непросто".

traits.locale_text: "Конечно, мой господин. Прятки лицемеров проводятся у нас каждый лунарий. Незадолго до игрищ прислугу тщательно отмывают от грязи и нечистот, расчесывают, облачают в дорогие наряды и приглашают во двор вместе с остальными гостями. И на протяжении всего торжества дворяне отгадывают, кто лицемер. Порой отличить их бывает крайне непросто".

languages.text: "Of course, my lord. The Impostor Hunt takes place every moonlife. Shortly before the event, the servants are thoroughly cleansed of dirt and foulness, combed, dressed in expensive clothing and masks, and invited into the courtyard with the rest of the guests. The nobles hide their faces as well, and then, they try to guess who the impostors are. Telling one from the other is quite a challenge, sometimes."
languages.original_text: "Конечно, мой господин. Прятки лицемеров проводятся у нас каждый лунарий. Дворяне тоже скрывают свое лицо и на протяжении всего торжества отгадывают, кто лицемер. Порой отличить их бывает крайне непросто".

traits.locale_text: "But of course, my lord. The Impostor Hunt takes place every lunarium. Shortly before the feast, the servants are thoroughly washed of dirt and foulness, combed, dressed in expensive clothes and masks, and invited into the courtyard with the rest of the guests. The nobles also hide their faces and try to guess who the impostors are. Sometimes telling them from one another is quite a challenge."

languages.text: “当然没问题，大人。我们每个月都会举办狩猎冒牌货的活动。宴会开始前不久，那些农奴会被彻底清洗干净，梳洗打扮一番，穿上昂贵的衣服，戴上面具，和其他宾客一同被邀请到院子里。当然，所有贵族也都会戴上面具。在此之后，参与者要试着猜出哪些人是冒牌货。有的时候，找出冒牌货是件相当有挑战性的事情。”
languages.original_text: "Of course, my lord. The Impostor Hunt takes place every moonlife. Shortly before the event, the servants are thoroughly cleansed of dirt and foulness, combed, dressed in expensive clothing and masks, and invited into the courtyard with the rest of the guests. The nobles hide their faces as well, and then, they try to guess who the impostors are. Telling one from the other is quite a challenge, sometimes."

traits.locale_text: “当然没问题，大人。我们每个月都会举办狩猎冒牌货的活动。宴会开始前不久，那些农奴会被彻底清洗干净，梳洗打扮一番，穿上昂贵的衣服，戴上面具，和其他宾客一同被邀请到院子里。当然，所有贵族也都会戴上面具。在此之后，参与者要试着猜出哪些人是冒牌货。有的时候，找出冒牌货是件相当有挑战性的事情。”

languages.text: «Desde luego, mi señor. La Caza del Impostor tiene lugar cada ciclo lunar. Poco antes del evento, la servidumbre es aseada meticulosamente a fin de eliminar toda impureza; se les peina, se visten con ropas caras y máscaras, y se les invita al patio para que se mezclen con el resto de los invitados. Los nobles también ocultan sus rostros, y luego tratan de adivinar quiénes son los impostores. A veces cuesta muchísimo distinguirlos».
languages.original_text: "Of course, my lord. The Impostor Hunt takes place every moonlife. Shortly before the event, the servants are thoroughly cleansed of dirt and foulness, combed, dressed in expensive clothing and masks, and invited into the courtyard with the rest of the guests. The nobles hide their faces as well, and then, they try to guess who the impostors are. Telling one from the other is quite a challenge, sometimes."

traits.locale_text: «Desde luego, mi señor. La Caza del Impostor tiene lugar cada ciclo lunar. Poco antes del evento, la servidumbre es aseada meticulosamente a fin de eliminar toda impureza; se les peina, se visten con ropas caras y máscaras, y se les invita al patio para que se mezclen con el resto de los invitados. Los nobles también ocultan sus rostros, y luego tratan de adivinar quiénes son los impostores. A veces cuesta muchísimo distinguirlos».

languages.text: "Elbette lordum. Taklitçi Avı, her ay döngüsünde düzenlenen bir gelenektir. Etkinlikten hemen önce hizmetkârlar kirden ve pastan iyice arındırılır, taranır, pahalı giysiler ve maskeler giydirilir ve diğer misafirlerle birlikte avluya davet edilir. Soylular da yüzlerini gizler ve tahmin yürüterek taklitçileri bulmaya çalışırlar. İnsanları ayırt etmek bazen epey zorlayıcı olabilir."
languages.original_text: "Of course, my lord. The Impostor Hunt takes place every moonlife. Shortly before the event, the servants are thoroughly cleansed of dirt and foulness, combed, dressed in expensive clothing and masks, and invited into the courtyard with the rest of the guests. The nobles hide their faces as well, and then, they try to guess who the impostors are. Telling one from the other is quite a challenge, sometimes."

traits.locale_text: "Elbette lordum. Taklitçi Avı, her ay döngüsünde düzenlenen bir gelenektir. Soylular da yüzlerini gizler ve tahmin yürüterek taklitçileri bulmaya çalışırlar. İnsanları ayırt etmek bazen epey zorlayıcı olabilir."

languages.text: 「もちろんです、ご主人様。『偽者探し』は月の周期ごとに行われます。そのイベントの直前に、使用人たちは汚れを落とし、身なりを整え、髪をくしでとかし、高い服に着替え、仮面を付けて、他のお客様と一緒に中庭に招かれます。貴族たちも顔を隠し、誰が偽者なのかを推測します。見分けるのが難しい場合もあります」
languages.original_text: "Of course, my lord. The Impostor Hunt takes place every moonlife. Shortly before the event, the servants are thoroughly cleansed of dirt and foulness, combed, dressed in expensive clothing and masks, and invited into the courtyard with the rest of the guests. The nobles hide their faces as well, and then, they try to guess who the impostors are. Telling one from the other is quite a challenge, sometimes."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんです、ご主人様。『偽者探し』は月の周期ごとに行われます。そのイベントの直前に、使用人たちは汚れを落とし、身なりを整え、髪をくしでとかし、高い服に着替え、仮面を付けて、他のお客様と一緒に中庭に招かれます。貴族たちも顔を隠し、誰が偽者なのかを推測します。見分けるのが難しい場合もあります」

languages.text: « Bien entendu, Votre Seigneurie. La Chasse aux imposteurs a lieu à chaque nouvelle lune. Un peu avant l'événement, les serviteurs sont méticuleusement lavés, peignés et vêtus de tenues et de masques coûteux avant d'être invités à se mêler aux autres convives de la cour. Également masqués, les nobles doivent alors essayer de deviner qui parmi eux sont les imposteurs. Parfois, il est très difficile de distinguer les vrais des faux. »
languages.original_text: "Of course, my lord. The Impostor Hunt takes place every moonlife. Shortly before the event, the servants are thoroughly cleansed of dirt and foulness, combed, dressed in expensive clothing and masks, and invited into the courtyard with the rest of the guests. The nobles hide their faces as well, and then, they try to guess who the impostors are. Telling one from the other is quite a challenge, sometimes."

traits.locale_text: « Bien entendu, Votre Seigneurie. La Chasse aux imposteurs a lieu à chaque nouvelle lune. Un peu avant l'événement, les serviteurs sont méticuleusement lavés, peignés et vêtus de tenues et de masques coûteux avant d'être invités à se mêler aux autres convives de la cour. Également masqués, les nobles doivent alors essayer de deviner qui parmi eux sont les imposteurs. Parfois, il est très difficile de distinguer les vrais des faux. »

languages.text: "Selbstverständlich, mein Lord. Die Jagd auf den Hochstapler findet jedes Mondleben statt. Kurz vor dem Ereignis werden die Diener gründlich von Schmutz und Verderbnis gereinigt, gekämmt, in teure Kleidung und Masken gewandet und gemeinsam mit den übrigen Gästen in den Hof eingeladen. Auch die Adeligen verbergen ihre Gesichter, und dann versuchen sie zu erraten, wer die Hochstapler sind. Es kann eine echte Herausforderung sein, sie auseinanderzuhalten."
languages.original_text: "Of course, my lord. The Impostor Hunt takes place every moonlife. The nobles hide their faces as well, and then, they try to guess who the impostors are. Telling one from the other is quite a challenge, sometimes."
